Source.Name: riot
Source.Summary: Electron based Matrix client built using the Matrix React SDK
Source.Description: Riot is an electron based Matrix client that allows cross platform communication between IRC, slack, gitter and riot/matrix users. Also has secure end to end encrypted chat through text, audio and video with users of riot/matrix on Android, iOS, Windows, OSX, Linux and web browsers.
